page_content: Discusses the conditions for salary continuation in case of accidents for employees.
Discusses regulations and procedures for dehorning and castrating animals.
Discusses the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on healthcare, employment, and social solidarity in the Kanton Solothurn.
Discusses the implementation of programming education in primary schools, focusing on the "Scalable Game Design" concept.
Discusses the reimbursement of expenses incurred during work, according to the employment agreement.
Discusses an event where products made by inmates of the Justizvollzugsanstalt Solothurn are sold.
Discusses a project for modernizing the sewerage infrastructure data management system.
